## reverse variable

HOF comparator. Returns new comparator with reversed order of given comparator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reverse: <T>(cmp: import("@thi.ng/api").Fn2<T, T, number>) => import("@thi.ng/api").Fn2<T, T, number>
```
